title: Sound-clarity of the Google Pixel 2XL phone
content:
Hi, mine is a Google Pixel 2XL, my 3rd one!  The sound-clarity, during conversations, is atrocious, even on speaker phone! I keep asking the other person to repeat themselves.

Would a 3rd party App (say, a graphic equalizer) be safe to use with the phone?? IF so, would ANYONE know of such an App?

Thanks a million for any help!

Lone
